ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM List Phone Numbers
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM List Phone Numbers
ActivityMetadata.Description:
A Zoom account owner or admin can purchase phone numbers and assign them to Zoom phone users. Use this API to list all Zoom Phone numbers in a Zoom account. You can filter the response based on your needs by using query parameters.
**Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher plan with Zoom phone license **Scope:** `phone:read:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

List Phone Numbers

A Zoom account owner or admin can purchase phone numbers and assign them to Zoom phone users. Use this API to list all Zoom Phone numbers in a Zoom account. You can filter the response based on your needs by using query parameters. **Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher plan with Zoom phone license **Scope:** `phone:read:admin`

Method: Get

OperationID: listAccountPhoneNumbers

EndPoint:

/phone/numbers
